tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DiseaseOutbreaks (
  outbreak_id INT,
  disease_name VARCHAR(255),
  affected_region VARCHAR(255),
  total_cases INT,
  recovery_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE DiseaseOutbreaks (
	outbreak_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	region_id INT,
	outbreak_name TEXT,
	outbreak_date DATE,
	response_efforts TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE disease_outbreaks (
  outbreak_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  region_name VARCHAR(255),
  disease_name VARCHAR(255),
  number_of_cases INT,
  outbreak_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE response_efforts (
  response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  outbreak_id INT,
  organization_name VARCHAR(255),
  response_date DATE,
  response_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Outbreaks (
   outbreak_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   disease_id INT,
   region_id INT,
   outbreak_date DATE,
   FOREIGN KEY (disease_id) REFERENCES Diseases(disease_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES Regions(region_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ResponseEfforts (
   response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   outbreak_id INT,
   response_date DATE,
   response_description TEXT,
   FOREIGN KEY (outbreak_id) REFERENCES Outbreaks(outbreak_id)
);

CREATE TABLE outbreaks (
    outbreak_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    outbreak_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    region VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE cases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    outbreak_id INT NOT NULL,
    case_date DATE NOT NULL,
    region VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);
